ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Everquest interview...
ygData.msgSnippet: Q, We are one kill from Time. I am hoping today will be the day. Our spawn is up, just waiting to get home, and see if we can get that bastage :) It will be an
ygData.messageBody:
Q,
 
We are one kill from Time. I am hoping today will be the day. Our spawn is up, just waiting to get home, and see if we can get that bastage :) It will be an exciting day.
 
Just out of curiousity, who is doing your pulling for the Rathe? for Fire? for Air? Granted, we use bards for some pulls, and we have allowed a SK to join our pull team, but um... who are you using?
 
Awulfie
 
Your monks must not be in PoP yet.

Q
--- Lorie C <mlchiello@...> wrote:
> I
was not aware that pulling was taken from you.
> Please do not tell my
monks. They are still happily
> pulling, and doing it well.
>
> Awulfie
>
>
>   Ummmmmm, ok if you say
so.  I'm still paying my
>   subscription so I am "dealing
with it" obviously.
> My
>   problem is not a small
one.  Bards have a role,
> monks
>   do not.  We
can't tank.  We can't harmony.  We
> can't
>  
do melee damage like a Rogue or a Warrior.  We are
>
too
>   stupid for trade skills (although that's what I
>
spend
>   most of my game time doing since groups only
pick
> up
>   monks as one of the "extra one or
two".
>
>   The idea of a monk class does rock, I agree,
but
> since
>   they took pulling away from us, and they
took
> tanking
>   away from us, all we can do is lay down
and play
> dead
>   and hope for a charitable group to
pick us up once
> in
>   a while.
>
>   That's a thing.
>
>  
Quwi
>   --- Lorie C <mlchiello@...>
wrote:
>   > You cannot whine about monks being nerfed.
Bards
>   > have been nerfed on almost every patch.
Roll
> with it
>   > and deal. Monks still
rock.
>   >
>   > I would like to hear
from the part of the dev
> team
>   > that deals with
the classes, and how the deal
> with
>   > what they
envision for the classes.
>   >
>   > And
please, who coined the phrase, "Working as
>   > intended."
That kills me!
>   >
>   > Awulfie
A'Mused

interview...

>   >   LOL, not sure the name, but I'd love to
hear
> from
>   > who
>   >   the frock made the decision to nerf the monk
>
class
>   > out
>   >   of
general usefulness.  Brad?  I have a
>
message
>   > for
>   >   him
not suitable for minors who might read
> this
>   >
board,
>   >   but you can picture what it might be
after all
> of
>   > the
>   >   time I have invested in my monk. </em
grins
>   > evilly>
>   >
>   >   Quwi Changkane Grandmaster of Fenin
Ro
